title: Chow
description:
This app is a personal project and is a work in progress. The idea was simple, build something that would help people decide on what to eat. Chow chooses a random eatery nearby the user's current location. 

An app that enables users to explore restaurants they wouldn't normally try, which in turn, generates traffic to more obscure local restaurants which, I hope, can help to enrich local communities.
